original_title: 妻が極道の男に半年間、毎日中出しされていたなんて知らなかった。  希島あいり
overview: It all started with a visit from my husband's boss, Mr. Abe. "My husband made a mistake. I don't know about him yet, but it's going to cost me more than 100 million dollars in compensation." Since then, Ms. Abe has been coming to me while her husband is away and roughing me up.
title: I didn’t know that my wife had been creampie’d every day for 6 months by a gangster. Airi Kijima
